enWisdom: Trusting in Allah is the best pillar [of support]
Trusting in Allah is the fortress of wisdom
Trusting in Allah is the best action
The probity of worship is [in] having trust in Allah

Wisdom: لَا تَجْعَلَنَّ لِنَفْسِكَ تَوَكُّلًا إِلَّا عَلَى اللَّهِ وَلَا يَكُنْ لَكَ رَجَاءٌ إِلَّا اللَّهُ
enWisdom: Never allow yourself to trust in anyone but Allah, and you should have no hope in anyone but Allah

Wisdom: يَنْبَغِي لِمَنْ رَضِيَ بِقَضَاءِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ أَنْ يَتَوَكَّلَ عَلَيْهِ
enWisdom: It behoves one who is pleased with the decree of Allah, the Glorified, to rely upon Him

Wisdom: اجْعَلُوا كُلَّ رَجَائِكُمْ لِلَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ وَلَا تَرْجُوا أَحَداً سِوَاهُ فَإِنَّهُ مَا رَجَا أَحَدٌ غَيْرَ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى إِلَّا خَابَ
enWisdom: Keep all your hope for Allah, the Glorified, and do not have hope [in] anyone other than Him, for indeed no one has hoped in other than Allah, the Exalted, but that he has been disappointed

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ أَنْ تَتَخَيَّرَ لِنَفْسِكَ [وَ اسْتَخِرْ] فَإِنَّ أَكْثَرَ النُّجْحِ فِيمَا لَا يُحْتَسَبُ
enWisdom: Beware of choosing [a path] for yourself [instead of putting your trust in Allah], for indeed most of the success lies in that which is not reckoned

Wisdom: اسْتَخِرْ وَلَا تَتَخَيَّرْ فَكَمْ مَنْ تَخَيَّرَ أَمْراً كَانَ هَلَاكُهُ فِيهِ
enWisdom: Seek what is best and do not chose what you want, for how many a person who has chosen what he wanted and found his own destruction in it!

Wisdom: فِرُّوا إِلَى اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ وَلَا تَفِرُّوا مِنْهُ فَإِنَّهُ مُدْرِكُكُمْ وَلَنْ تُعْجِزُوهُ
enWisdom: Flee towards Allah, the Glorified, and do not flee away from Him, for indeed He will find you and you will not escape Him

Wisdom: كُلَّمَا لَا يَنْفَعُ شَيْ‏ءٌ يَضُرُّ وَالدُّنْيَا مَعَ حَلَاوَتِهَا تَمُرُّ وَالْفَقْرُ مَعَ الْغِنَى بِاللَّهِ لَا يَضُرُّ
enWisdom: Whatever does not benefit, harms, and this world with its sweetness, becomes bitter whereas poverty with [seeking] sufficiency through Allah, never harms
